title: Restore student practice navigation and remove question deletion controls from contributor mode

requirements.text: Remove the ability to delete individual questions from the Contributor Panel UI (remove any delete/trash controls, the delete confirmation dialog, and any wiring that triggers single-question deletion).

quotes: First remove make a question remove option in contributor mode

acceptanceCriteria: Contributor Panel no longer shows any UI to delete a single question (no trash icon/button per question, no per-question delete dialog).
Creating and editing questions in Contributor Panel still works.
Admin-only bulk cleanup actions (if present) remain admin-gated and unchanged unless they depend on per-question delete UI.

requirements.text: Fix the student practice flow so opening a level/category launches a valid practice session without showing: "Subject is required. Chapter ID is required. Category is required. Please go back and select a valid practice session." Restore the navigation/parameter passing behavior to match the working previous version.

quotes:
And all questions added by contributer should be visible to student but currently it is showing when I openn level it shows Subject is required. Chapter ID is required. Category is required. Please go back and select a valid practice session.
Solve this and make it like it was before

acceptanceCriteria: Starting practice from ChapterCategorySelectPage navigates to PracticePage with subject, chapterId, and category correctly populated (no 'Invalid Practice Session' error).

PracticePage reads subject/chapterId/category from the route parameters used by navigation (and reads year from search only when applicable), so the validation error is not triggered during normal navigation.
Practice sessions load questions successfully for Level 1, NEET PYQ, and JEE PYQ (including year selection when applicable).

requirements.text: Ensure questions created by contributors are visible in student mode (including when the student is not logged in) by allowing read-only access to chapter/question query endpoints used by the student flow.

quotes: And all questions added by contributer should be visible to student

acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users can load chapter lists and question lists needed for student practice selection and practice sessions (no authorization trap for read-only queries).
Authenticated-only features (e.g., saving practice progress to the canister, submitting results, contributor/admin mutations) remain protected.
Questions created via createQuestion are returned by getQuestionsByChapterAndCategory and getQuestionsByChapterCategoryAndYear and appear in the student UI.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (add migration.mo only if state schema changes).

Do not edit frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not add new authentication providers (Internet Identity only).
Do not add new contributor features beyond removing the delete option and restoring the student practice session behavior.
Do not introduce external databases or third-party backends.
